snippet: Sandi Jackson, the wife of former Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr., has resigned from the Chicago City Council.
abstract: Sandi Jackson, wife of former Rep Jesse L Jackson Jr, resigns from Chicago City Council, saying she could not adequately represent her ward while dealing with family health matters.
lead_paragraph: Sandi Jackson, the wife of former Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr., has resigned from the Chicago City Council.

headline.main: Illinois: Jackson’s Wife Resigns From Chicago Council
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Jackson’s Wife Resigns From Chicago Council
